about_the_game:
◆◆What is Unbelievaboom?◆◆


Unbelievaboom! is an explosive soccer shooting game based on the concept of "explosions are fun".

The game allows players to play 3-on-3 online matches, offering a different kind of e-sports experience.

◆◆Game Rules◆◆


Unbelievaboom! is a TPS online soccer game in which players fight with bombs and exploding projectiles.

Matches are played 3vs3.
Players take to the field with a unique character and a combination of weapons and bombs of their choice. The team that scores more points than its opponent by using skills and items wins.





If you attack an enemy player and destroy his shield, you can make him go down.
When a player is down, he or she will be blown up and you can kill him or her by blasting him or her out of the field.
This is called a burst.

If you burst out of the field, you will respawn after a certain amount of time, but the bursting team's own goalposts will become bigger!
Blast the enemy all over the place, and then blast the ball toward the enlarged enemy goal.

Originality

.
Anything on the field can be moved by blowing it up with an explosion. Any enemy in the way can be blown off the field with a blast, and the ball can also be blown up with a blast and shot into the opponent's goal. The game also allows you to move the goalposts with a blast to protect your own goal.
Take advantage of the game with Unbelievable explosions!



Do you shoot the ball? Or blow up the enemy and make the goal huge?
Assess the battle situation and cooperate with your friends to win!

short_description: This title is an explosive soccer shooter based on the concept that explosions are fun. Use bombs and exploding bullets to blow up your surroundings and aim for the goal! In this title, you can blow up not only enemies and balls, but also yourself, goal posts, and everything else!
